Text:
I now have all 21 books seeded.  I hope you enjoy them as much as I do. 

Click on my name istrahd above and it will take you to a download link to all of them.

I think this is a big effort, thanks.  I am seeding 1-13 and 21 (so far 2x with more tonight).  

Will pop a quality tag on once I've had a chance to listen to the results.  

Well done and thanks istrahd!  This is a class historical series.
